T01n822u_001:2: pratijñātaṃ samutpāde trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 1 ||
T01n822u_001:4: bandhuvargaiḥ parityaktaṃ trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 2 ||
T01n822u_001:8: ekākī taṃ hi bhokṣyāmi trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 4 ||
T01n822u_001:10: andhībhūto'smyahaṃ nātha trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 5 ||
T01n822u_001:12: durlaṅghyaṃ ca mayā dṛṣṭaṃ trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 6 ||
T01n822u_001:13: dharmādharma na vijñātaṃ gamyāgamyaṃ na veditam |
T01n822u_001:14: acetano'smyahaṃ nātha trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 7 ||
T01n822u_001:16: pacyāmi narake ghore trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 8 ||
T01n822u_001:18: kṛtā mayā sattvahiṃsā trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 9 ||
T01n822u_001:20: veṣṭitaṃ karmasūtreṇa trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 10 ||
T01n822u_001:22: īdṛśaṃ jīvitaṃ loke trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 11 ||
T01n822u_001:24: panthānaṃ nātra paśyāmi trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 12 ||
T01n822u_001:26: rājahatyāṃ tadā manye trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 13 ||
T01n822u_001:28: gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ kasya trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 14 ||
